s3games.player

Class CameraPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.player.Player
      • s3games.player.CameraPlayer

  • public class CameraPlayer
extends Player
    Camera player is utilizing the camera controller object to read the moves made by human on the real-world board
